title: Entity Data Type Schema
description: A definition of the entity data type types that EntityTypeColumns can have.

properties.description: The technical string property used as a discriminator. It contains the name of a particular entity data type.

StringEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-5

RangedUUIDEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-2, https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-3

OpenUUIDEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-4

IntegerEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-7

DateEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-9

BooleanEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-8

EnumEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-11

objectDefinition.description: The entity type describing the complex column when the data type is OBJECT.

ObjectEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-10

itemDataType.description: The data type used for the array's items.

ArrayEntityDataType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-6
